```{r}
library("R.utils")


URL="http://ftp.ensemblgenomes.org/pub/bacteria/release-53/fasta/bacteria_121_collection/streptococcus_thermophilus_cag_236_gca_000434755/dna/"

gunzip("ecoli_cds.fa.gz")
list.files()

library("seqinr")

str(head(cds))

length(cds)
```
